relation: Apples, apricots, berries, cherries, lemons, peaches, pears, plums, nectarines
Bananas, grapes, melon, oranges, pineapple, tropical fruits
Any flours, soups thickened with flour
textBeforeTable: Section 2 (eat as much as you want!) - Alkaline forming foods:   Tofu (plain, unsweetened)
textAfterTable: To be avoided entirely: Breads                   F lours or flour products Dairy products (may have butter) Tropical fruits All fermented foods (wine, beer, vinegar, soy sauce, black tea, miso)   Notes: *coffee, green tea and herbal tea are acceptable, max 2 cups a day **barley, kasha, bulgar, spelt, kamut, amaranth, oats, and rye whole grains are allowed as part of the 20% list as they are acid-forming ***cook and use lots of olive oil, flax oil, sunflower oil or coconut oil (my new favourite!)
